mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.doc_id AS "doc_id", a.sbmc AS "sbmc", a.pp AS "pp", a.xh AS "xh", a.sl AS "sl", a.sbjg AS "sbjg", a.trsynf AS "trsynf"
mapper.select:
SELECT
a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.doc_id AS "doc_id", a.sbmc AS "sbmc", a.pp AS "pp", a.xh AS "xh", a.sl AS "sl", a.sbjg AS "sbjg", a.trsynf AS "trsynf"
FROM ironfo_yjbylsbpz_yjk a
a.doc_id = #{doc_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_yjbylsbpz_yjk( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, doc_id, sbmc, pp, xh, sl, sbjg, trsynf ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{doc_id}, #{sbmc}, #{pp}, #{xh}, #{sl}, #{sbjg}, #{trsynf} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_yjbylsbpz_yjk SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, doc_id = #{doc_id}, sbmc = #{sbmc}, pp = #{pp}, xh = #{xh}, sl = #{sl}, sbjg = #{sbjg}, trsynf = #{trsynf} WHERE id = #{id}
